title: Beton opinions
content:
I’m looking to use a clean feminine serif for a magazine. They are currently using Californian FB Display and are using Nobel to complement it.

I’m really liking the look of beton and am looking for any opinions of beton itself and any suggestions for a sans serif which might go along with it.

Thanks

author: Jayomatic

comments.content:
_clean feminine serif_

But will settle for smart mature gentleman?

Beton has no italics. That may be a problem. Consider the more feminine [PMN Caecilia](http://web.archive.org/web/20081120073611/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&searchstr=caecilia).

or how about Fresco? it’s got everything covered.
